name: arrayDelete
description: Deletes specified object from given array

params.name: scope
params.description: Lucee4.5+ remove one (default) or all occurances of the object

examples.title: Delete a value from an array
examples.description: Uses the arrayAppend function to append a value to the end of the array

examples.title: Delete a value from an array using the Array member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Invoking the delete function on an array is the same as running arrayDelete.

examples.title: Use of scope parameter
examples.description: Lucee4.5+ Use scope to remove one or all occurances of the object
